title: Juniper Advisory
text:
Juniper Advisory is a consulting firm based in <a href="Chicago">Chicago</a> that focuses exclusively on <a href="non-profit%20hospital">non-profit hospital</a> <a href="mergers%20and%20acquisitions">mergers and acquisitions</a>. Founded by veteran investment bankers James Burgdorfer and David Gordon, the firm provides strategic financial advice relating to <a href="business%20combination">business combination</a> transactions and other <a href="corporate%20finance">corporate finance</a> matters.
The firm specializes in <a href="mergers">mergers</a>, <a href="acquisitions">acquisitions</a>, <a href="divestitures">divestitures</a>, <a href="partnerships">partnerships</a>, <a href="joint%20ventures">joint ventures</a>, and <a href="lease">lease</a> arrangements in the industry. It is particularly active in advising <a href="government">government</a>-owned, <a href="501%28c%29%283%29">501(c)(3)</a>, faith-based, and <a href="academic%20medical%20centers">academic medical centers</a> on <a href="structural">structural</a> <a href="ownership">ownership</a> alternatives.
Background.
Members of Juniper came from several larger <a href="Wall%20Street">Wall Street</a> firms, includes: <a href="Citigroup">Citigroup</a>, <a href="J.P.%20Morgan">J.P. Morgan</a>, <a href="Piper%20Jaffray">Piper Jaffray</a>, <a href="Morgan%20Stanley">Morgan Stanley</a>, <a href="A.G.%20Becker">A.G. Becker</a>, <a href="Nuveen">Nuveen</a>, <a href="Rothschild%20%26amp%3B%20Co">Rothschild & Co</a>, <a href="William%20Blair%20%26amp%3B%20Company">William Blair</a>, and others. Several modeled their academic educations around healthcare <a href="finance">finance</a> and <a href="economics">economics</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Chicago">University of Chicago</a>, <a href="Northwestern%20University">Northwestern University</a>, <a href="University%20of%20Michigan">University of Michigan</a>, <a href="Notre%20Dame%20University">Notre Dame University</a>, and <a href="Vanderbilt%20University">Vanderbilt University</a>.
Transactions.
Recent advisory assignments include transactions with: The <a href="Cleveland%20Clinic">Cleveland Clinic</a>, <a href="Northwestern%20Memorial%20Hospital">Northwestern Memorial Hospital</a>, The <a href="University%20of%20Chicago%20Medical%20Center">University of Chicago Medical Center</a>, <a href="CHRISTUS%20Health">CHRISTUS Health</a>, <a href="Adventist%20Health">Adventist Health</a>, <a href="Jefferson%20Health">Jefferson Health</a>, <a href="Hospital%20Corporation%20of%20America">Hospital Corporation of America</a> (during ownership under <a href="Bain%20Capital">Bain Capital</a>, <a href="Kohlberg%20Kravis%20Roberts">KKR</a>, and <a href="Merrill%20Lynch">Merrill Lynch</a>), <a href="Duke%20University%20Health%20System">Duke University Health System</a> and <a href="LifePoint%20Health">LifePoint Health</a>, <a href="UnityPoint%20Health">UnityPoint Health</a>, <a href="Spectrum%20Health">Spectrum Health</a>, <a href="Sentara%20Healthcare">Sentara Healthcare</a>, <a href="Dignity%20Health">Dignity Health</a>, <a href="McLaren%20Health%20Care%20Corporation">McLaren Health Care Corporation</a>, <a href="Ardent%20Health%20Services">Ardent Health Services</a> (a <a href="portfolio%20company">portfolio company</a> of <a href="Welsh%2C%20Carson%2C%20Anderson%20%26amp%3B%20Stowe">Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe</a>, <a href="Equity%20International">Equity International</a>, and <a href="Ventas%2C%20Inc.">Ventas, Inc.</a>, <a href="Vanguard%20Health%20Systems">Vanguard Health Systems</a>, a portfolio company of <a href="The%20Blackstone%20Group">The Blackstone Group</a> now part of <a href="Tenet%20Healthcare">Tenet Healthcare</a>, <a href="Community%20Health%20Systems">Community Health Systems</a>, RCCH Health (a portfolio company of <a href="Warburg%20Pincus">Warburg Pincus</a>, <a href="Apollo%20Global%20Management">Apollo Global Management</a>) and <a href="Temple%20University%20Hospital">Temple University Hospital</a>.
Industry involvement.
The principals are active writers and speakers in the non-profit healthcare industry, and are frequently cited by "<a href="The%20Wall%20Street%20Journal">The Wall Street Journal</a>", "<a href="The%20Bond%20Buyer">The Bond Buyer</a>", "<a href="Modern%20Healthcare">Modern Healthcare</a>", "<a href="Trustee">Trustee</a>", "<a href="American%20Health%20Lawyers%20Association">American Health Lawyers Association</a>", "<a href="Chicago%20Tribune">Chicago Tribune</a>" "<a href="WGN-TV">WGN-TV</a>", and "<a href="Healthcare%20Financial%20Management%20Association">Healthcare Financial Management Association</a>".
Recent topics include <a href="fair%20market%20value">fair market value</a> considerations in <a href="consolidation%20%28business%29">consolidation (business)</a> transactions, <a href="fiduciary">fiduciary</a> <a href="governance">governance</a> responsibilities in change of control transactions. The team has authored a number of research articles, including stand-alone whitepapers for the "<a href="Chicago%20Council%20on%20Global%20Affairs">Chicago Council on Global Affairs</a>"
